method.name: ZoomImageView
method.comment: Zoom ImageView With Multitouch Return ImageView Example Usage : Dim stuLib As StudentLibrary Activity.AddView(stuLib.MultiTouchImageView(File.Combine(File.DirRootExternal,"picture.jpg")),0,0,100%x,100%y)

method.name: PlayStreamVideo
method.comment: Play Stream Online Video Argument Video Url and Package Name (Player Package Name) Set Package Name to null for run with other package Dim sl As StudentLibrary StartActivity(sl.PlayStreamVideo("http://www.iranapp.org/clip/b4a.mp4",""))

method.name: StartListenerShake
method.comment: Sub Globals Dim shake1 As Shake End Sub Sub Activity_Create(FirstTime As Boolean) shake1.StartListenShake("StudentShake") End Sub Sub StudentShake_OnShake(Direction As Boolean) If Direction = True Then ToastMessageShow("happen horizontal shake",False) Else ToastMessageShow("happen vertical shake",False) End if End Sub Sub Activity_Resume shake1.Initialize End Sub

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialize Shake Class

method.name: nextDay
method.comment: nextDay: Go to next julian day number (JDN) and adjusts the other dates.

method.name: setGregorianDate
method.comment: setGregorianDate: Sets the date according to the Gregorian calendar and adjusts the other dates. year: int month: int day: int

method.name: setJulianDate
method.comment: setJulianDate: Sets the date according to the Julian calendar and adjusts the other dates. year: int month: int day: int

method.name: previousDay
method.comment: previousDay: Go to previous julian day number (JDN) and adjusts the otehr dates.

method.name: toString
method.comment: toString: Overrides the default toString() method to return all dates. Return type: @return:String

method.name: setIranianDate
method.comment: setIranianDate: Sets the date according to the Iranian calendar and adjusts the other dates. year: int month: int day: int
